member.name: M:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: M:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.TryAuthenticate
member.summary: Executes an authentication request to the API using the application settings TimeLogProjectReportingSiteCode, TimeLogProjectReportingUser and TimeLogProjectReportingPassword.
member.remarks: Make sure to set the application setting TimeLogProjectUri.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the authentication is successful

member.name: M:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.TryAuthenticate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes an authentication request to the API using the parameters.
member.param: Site code part of the credentials to authenticate with
Username part of the credentials to authenticate with
ApiPassword part of the credentials to authenticate with
member.returns: A value indicating whether the authentication is successful

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of the .

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.ServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets the uri associated with the reporting service.

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.SiteCode
member.summary: Gets the sitecode associated with the reporting service

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.ApiId
member.summary: Gets the user associated with the reporting service

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.ApiPassword
member.summary: Gets the password associated with the reporting service

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.ServiceHandler.Client

member.name: M:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of the SettingsHandler.

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.Url
member.summary: Gets the base uri for the TimeLog Project site read from the application setting TimeLogProjectUri.

member.name: P:TimeLog.ReportingApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets the default max received message size for all calls to the TimeLog Project API. Default is 1024000, but can be overwritten from application setting TimeLogProjectMaxReceivedMessageSize.
